EDIT: new code works.

item.title: How can i make admins hp unlimited?
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Age_Elmo Ice Age Elmo
item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

Go to a file call “Characters” and find your name and double click on it
Then it will have a NotePad file with all your characters information on it.
Press Ctrl+F and put in

character-skill = 3

Then replace that line with:
character-skill =3 999999 2000000000
This will give you 999,999 hp!
This is dueable for all skills.
Just find:

character-skill =X

And replace X with one of the numbers below!
0-Attack
1-Strength
2-Defence
3-Hitpoints
4-Range
5-Prayer
6-Magic
7-Cooking
8-Woodcutting
9-Fletching
10-Fishing
11-Firemaking
12-Crafting
13-Smithing
14-Mining
15-Herblore
16-Agility
17-Thieving
18-Slayer
19-Farming
20-Runecrafting

Enjoy!

Read full topic
